verses.roman:
tomā lāgi' rāmānanda rājya tyāga kailā
tomā lāgi' sanātana 'viṣaya' chāḍilā

synonyms: tomā lāgi'-for Your sake; rāmānanda—Rāmānanda Rāya; rājya—the kingdom; tyāga kailā—gave up; tomā lāgi'-for Your sake; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; viṣaya—material life; chāḍilā—gave up.
translation: "It is only for Your sake that Rāmānanda Rāya resigned from the governorship of South India and Sanātana Gosvāmī gave up his post as minister.
